response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe perfectly aligns with your needs and expectations. Given its exceptional value and quality, I am confident it will significantly contribute to your endeavors. Considering its true worth and the benefits it offers, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at an exclusive price of $9,500. This special offer is designed to ensure you receive unparalleled value while allowing us to maintain a mutually beneficial relationship. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 9500}
